text.div:
ServiceDeliveryLocation name use value set

The set of values that describe how usage of the service delivery location name.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v3/EntityNameUse
    Code Display
    L Legal Name Known as/conventional/the one you use
    ASGN Assigned (alias) A name assigned to a person. Reasons some organizations assign alternate names may include not knowing the person's name, or to maintain anonymity. Some, but not necessarily all, of the name types that people call "alias" may fit into this category.
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/location-hspc-serviceDeliveryLocationNameUse

name: ServiceDeliveryLocation name use value set
description: The set of values that describe how usage of the service delivery location name.
